summary:
So many people liked my first Mod so here is another one.
Almost Skyrim 2 is a landscape I designed in the Unity 3d Game engine inspired by Skyrim.
This landscape is larger, take place at dusk, and has a few secrets for you to find.
descriptionHtml:
So many people liked my first Mod so here is another one.
Almost Skyrim 2 is a landscape I designed in the Unity 3d Game engine inspired by Skyrim.
This landscape is larger, take place at dusk, and has a few secrets for you to find.

NOTE: as with the first mod to Quit you have to use the Task Manager, I have not found out how to script and exit key yet.
author: ThorsHand11
